subject: p10410641
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, the patient has developed a right pneumothorax, the gap of the pneumothorax is about 3 cm large. There currently are no signs of tension. Right-sided pigtail catheter. On the left, a second pigtail catheter has been inserted. The catheter insertion caused a substantial decrease of the pre-existing extensive left pleural effusion. There is no evidence of left pneumothorax. The rightward mediastinal shift has completely reversed. Areas of atelectasis are seen at both lung bases. Normal size of the cardiac silhouette.
